mapper.select: SELECT rnum, RBID, MEMBER_MID, WRITER, BRANCH_BID, COUPON_CID, BRANCHNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, IMAGE_DATA, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, IMAGE_TYPE, created_at, modified_at FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, RBID, MEMBER_MID, WRITER, BRANCH_BID, COUPON_CID, BRANCHNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, STATUS, IMAGE_DATA, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, IMAGE_TYPE, created_at, modified_at FROM (SELECT R.RBID, R.MEMBER_MID, M.EMAIL AS WRITER, R.BRANCH_BID, R.COUPON_CID, B.NAME AS BRANCHNAME, R.TITLE, R.CONTENT, R.STATUS, R.IMAGE IMAGE_DATA, R.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, R.IMAGE_TYPE, R.created_at, R.modified_at FROM REVIEWBOARD R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.member_mid = m.mid JOIN BRANCH B ON R.branch_bid = b.bid WHERE B.bid = #{paramId} ORDER BY R.MODIFIED_AT DESC) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo}) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
